Class TrueAndFalseQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uow.QuestionLibrary.TrueAndFalseQuestion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Question, java.io.Serializable

    public class TrueAndFalseQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
implements Question
    Implements a true or false question based on the question interface
